message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a [product description] that I think you'd be very interested in. I'm asking for $150 for it. Let me know if you're interested!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product description you provided. I would like to make a counteroffer at $130 for the product.
Bob, thanks for your counteroffer.  While I appreciate your interest, $130 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $140.  Let me know what you think!
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $135 for the product.
